website_summaries.verdict: Samsung has improved the second-generation Gear Icon X to become one of the better totally wireless headphones, especially for Galaxy phone owners.
pros: Samsung's Gear Icon X 2018 is a small, comfortable-to-wear, totally wireless earphone that has improved battery life and a smaller charging case than the previous model's
They fit discreetly, sound decent for this type of headphone, and have touch controls as well as some extra fitness-oriented features
Charging case charges via USB-C and has a quick-charge mode
cons: Some of the features don't work with iOS devices
touch controls are a bit hit or miss

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for first few weeks then the left one ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for first few weeks then the left one stopped producing sound. Tried reset via button on earbud and via gear app. Updated gear app. Have not dropped or damages buds. Phone recognizes connection to phone and right one still works.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F. Olson

customer_reviews.title: These Buds are the best available, i can hear them even over my motorcycle when im riding.
customer_reviews.text: I received my first pair with my Samsung 9+ they are the SM-140 2018 version, they are so great i came here to Amazon to buy another pair before they disappeared these ear buds with the great features make them great! The 2019 version SM-150 ONLY has features for sports, or working out.... im not interested in that but the features that were left out from the 2018 version is what made them great and now they have discounted them. SAMSUNG, BRING BACK THE SM-140 AND GIVE THEM MORE GAIN IN THE AMBIENT MODE, I NEED THE HEARING ASSISTANCE! THEN THEY WOULD GET THAT FIFTH STAR, AND BE THE VERY BEST BUDS MONEY CAN BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Spyderryder

customer_reviews.title: They'll Break
customer_reviews.text: They were great, but stopped working after one year. This was not ever a problem I ever had with any other in-ear headphones, but the sound would become muddled. I was advised by Samsung to keep them clean with alcohol. After a few cleaning, the pair got really glitchy. Lots of noise in the sound. Then parts started falling off, these tiny mesh-screens. And now, they've stopped working. Wow, Samsung really dropped the quality check. Especially for the price. I'll be switching back to my cheaper Bluetooth headphones by Aukey. Which still work and cost 1/5th the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Trouble prone
customer_reviews.text: I would approach the purchase of this product with caution. The first one I received was defective (the left ear bud would not charge.) Amazon was great and sent a replacement very quickly. After about two weeks this replacement developed the same issue. I did a search on the problem and found that it is happening with some frequency. If these had sounded great, I probably would have kept trying to get a pair that worked. Since their sound was not very satisfying, I elected to return them for a full refund. Perhaps in a few months Samsung will have resolved this problem, but for now...be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Design, wish they didn't lose connection during walking outside.
customer_reviews.text: i really wanted to like these things, and used in my office they worked awesome. Used on a workout this morning and they do not stay connected to the phone with the bluetooth connection if the phone is in my pocket. Constantly cutting out during music unless I hold the phone right in front of me. FAIL..... If that worked they'd be the bomb. Probably returning them because of this reason. Sound is fabulous, design is great, a bit of discomfort after wearing them a while but they stay in at least.
customer_reviews.author: MINI WINGS

customer_reviews.title: So close to being the best
customer_reviews.text: Tested them a couple hours at home and they were fine. Initially they were the best bluetooth earbuds I've had the pleasure of owning. The sound quality, connectivity, responsiveness, and fit were all top-notch; way better than Beoplay E8 that cost nearly twice as much. My first hour in the gym and I noticed the right earbud become quieter than the left. I tried putting them back in the case and reconnecting and hard resetting them, but I could not find a consistent fix. Looks like I'm going back to my old faithful TaoTronics TT-BH07.
customer_reviews.author: Rich D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like them before, but now oh my god I love them. A bit ago one stop working, but it was better within the day. The sound quality is amazing and you can filter in ambient noise and it has an equalizer that works extremely well. They're great for working out and stay in very well. They get a tad uncomfortable after long usage, but no reason not to buy them, it's just because they're snug so they fit in your ears.
customer_reviews.author: origami

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality at all.
customer_reviews.text: Sound was not what I expected. And making a phone call caused me to shout just to be heard by the other party (barely). And to hear their feedback in the earbud was worse. So I went out and purchased a pair of Bose for only $11 dollars more and got 200% better quality out of those. $179 is too much to pay for samsung earbuds that are of that quality. And I am ashamed to even write this because I am a die hard samsung fan!!!!! I would expect that from a no name brand company.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Simply great. The sound quality isn't the best
customer_reviews.text: Simply great. The sound quality isn't the best, but as a over all head phone it is really great. Comfortable, different ear tip sizes to choose from, never falling out my ears while I work out and travel. Was great until this: I bought a pair of Iconx a week ago and volume on left earbud dropped (very quiet and narrow sound, no bass at all) to almost inaudible after approximately 2h of listening. Got them replaced and the seconnd pair of Iconx got the same problem on both earbuds after just 1h of usage. I’m using Note 8 phone.
customer_reviews.author: DivineIparts

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad depending on what you use them for.
customer_reviews.text: These are good for excersizing only. Keeping up with your work out, telling you about your progress, and even motivating you to go harder. But as far as music sound quality it's not the best. After awhile the sound gets worse after use. You have to make sure you keep them clean and dry after every use. The charge is not bad but it seems to drain battery even when not in use. This product only benefits those using it for fitness purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are comfortable. Putting music on them is easy. Sound quality is good. The controls are all taps and swipes so that was interesting to get used to. I thou gh ht the price was fair also
customer_reviews.author: Cory S

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This are the worst ear phones I ever had. They suck really bad. They cost a lot of money and they don't work. After I used for like 3 times they lost the volume. I reset it. Like 3 times and just don't work. Don't waste your money. Better get the 20 dollars they work like a champ. And I am a Samsung fan. Totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jose ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Earbuds to Pair with Samsung Note9
customer_reviews.text: Amazing performance in the battery life, sound quality, and range. I have been using the same pair for close to a year, and they work as good as the day I got them. Helps to keep them clean!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peila

customer_reviews.title: No Bueno.
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of Samsung. Have had every Galaxy phone since the S4. Samung T.V, Samsung Watch. Have to say disappointed with this product. Volume was lacking, connectivity issues, and eventually the left bud stopped working all together. Completed all trouble shooting steps with no success. *Awaiting Samsung to send back refurbished replacement pair.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Solid wireless earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: There are many wireless earbuds out there.. Samsung icons 2018 version is far better than other wireless earbuds. These are comfortable to wear, easy to connect, good design, and good battery life. Earbuds charging, and carrying case only charges earbuds once, and that might be only one small complain from these earbuds. Better than Bose or other earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Rz

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like these
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING! When they actually work. I'm a samsung fan and really love their products but these ear buds have issues. After about 2 weeks the right ear bud volume stopped working. Tried to reset no luck. It was linked as all the touch functions were working but no sounds. I synced them to my wife's S9 with the same results. I was promptly refunded.
customer_reviews.author: AntMan2000me

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: After a few months, I finally have to say these things are pretty much garbage. They have a noise every time I move. I can’t make it go away no matter how I try. You can’t shut them off so the battery goes dead regularly. Now the left one stopped working. I wish I would not have made this purchase. They do sound good and connect easy, they just have way too many complicated and pointless features that you can’t tuen off.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Jappert

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for 3 days and they perform great. Comfortable after finding the right size buds and wings. Sound good. Connectivity is perfect. Charging case comes with a cord I use my fast charger from my Note 8 to charge it. I am over all very pleased with these. I use mine a lot at work. Love how only 1 can be used (either one).
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, you will be disappointed with Samsung
customer_reviews.text: The material that the ear buds were made of gelt like it was good quality, they fit in my ears comfortably. The reason I returned these twice was because of the constant intermittent connection loss between the ear buds and my samsung phone. The first pair the right ear bud stopped working completely. I would not recommend these, i am very disappointed with Samsung's quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Rossman

customer_reviews.title: Really saddening
customer_reviews.text: They are super comfortable and sound great.... For a week or two. Then the volume on one or both buds (first time it was both, this time it was just the left) will just drop like a rock. I got a replacement before and the same exact issue happened again, not gonna bother to try and replace them again.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Peck

customer_reviews.title: 2016 version vs. 2018 version
customer_reviews.text: I had the 2016 version of these and now I have the 2018 version. The sound quality on the 2016s is better but the battery life on the 2018s has improved greatly. Its a trade off but I am all about sound. These are still better than anything else out there as far as earbuds are concerned. If you have Beats earbuds or Apple Air these are an upgrade hands down. I just personally prefered the better sound of the older model over battery life of the newer model.
customer_reviews.author: Kidd

customer_reviews.title: These earbuds were fantastic for about a month and a half and then ...
customer_reviews.text: I own quite a few Samsung devices. These earbuds were fantastic for about a month and a half and then the right earbud began playing lower than the other. I reached out to Samsung and they blame Amazon. I can't get support from Amazon because my return window and support window are over...so, here I am with defective earbuds and neither want to help remedy the problem. Thanks Amazon and Samsung, for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unfitting/ Uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The device is amazing. Has hood ideas and functions. My problem is the comfort fit. It becomes a pain to feel them in your ear for a while. With a combination of the problems with the sensor which tells you if the ear piece is in your ear. It tends to go in and out. It doesn't really function properly which becomes pain staken. It pauses music and stops other functions you need to use. When adjusting so that the sensor reads correctly it sores your ear after how often you need to adjust. I do not suggest buying the ear pieces. It gets annoying over time!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mondelus

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT...
customer_reviews.text: Truly love the fact that I don't have to take my iPod to the gym, as you are able to load music directly into the ear pods. You can put different music onto each ear. They are also small enough for my little ears and have not had trouble with them falling out during my workout.
customer_reviews.author: HYLittlefeet

customer_reviews.title: Marginal at best, first pair left ear bud dead in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Marginal at best, first pair left ear bud dead in a week.. 2nd pair never knew when it was in my ear.. so didn't work correctly..both pair had bugs.. Samsung i expect better .. next
customer_reviews.author: ryannkc

customer_reviews.title: Bad device, poor customer service...Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: Left ear not working properly, battery level drops quickly. Amazon representative said it was still in warranty to call Samsung. I called and they said it's not on warranty. I purchase an extend warranty, Amazon could not help. Why pay the extended warranty if Amazon can't help? Called Amazon repersentuve, did not help at all, just gave me the run around, had to figure this myself, poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Juan E Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I have had nothing but problems since I bought them. Drop in and out all the time, touch pad works half the time. Save your money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Laboo

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the past version this is a great product
customer_reviews.text: I love these ear phones I hade the first version of the iconx that were terrible but the 2018 version is great the battery life was completely updated to a 5 hour battery and you do get the 5 hours of time I paid $150 and they are well worth the money they are very comfortable and compact and come with a case that will charge them in your down time which makes it last all day
customer_reviews.author: Edward Ignagni

customer_reviews.title: Left earbud stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Samsung sent a new one as it was within warranty. The second set of earbuds stopped working after 10months of use. The left side earbud has stopped working. It isnt worth wasting your money, look for some other product.
customer_reviews.author: Sridhar Aswath

customer_reviews.title: On the third pair. The first 2 pairs malfunctioned.
customer_reviews.text: Fit was nice and the sound quality wasn’t bad unit there was no sound from the right earbud. This happened twice and of course I’m out of time to return to amazon so Samsung sent me a third pair. I don’t want to open them just want to sell and move on to a different brand. Pointless to use while working out if the sound is going to quit out of one earbud. Do not waste your time or money, for the price you can get a better product from a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sound great. Poor manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these the week they were released. I loved using them. They were really comfortable during my long runs, never had an issue with losing them despite small size. The battery life was a significant improvement from the first generation. However, both of the pairs that I used ended up giving out with their sound output. The first set completely lost sound in one earbud after about 2 months (it wasn't a connection issue) and the replacement pair ended up having a severely muffled sound in one earbud after just 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Verble

customer_reviews.title: Yasss
customer_reviews.text: Better than the last pair of icon. They're not too loud but once you swap out the rubber tip for some foam tips, you're golden. Overall these are a much better version of the wireless earbuds. Great battery life, sleek and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Lopez

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: These wireless earbuds have very good audio and excellent features. Earbuds are very sensitive to touch and any movement close to ear. Many calls have dropped because of motion from hair near earbuds. Other than the sensitive issue they are great wireless earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Healthyashh

customer_reviews.title: Great Produce
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. We love everything about these earbuds. Easy to set up. Easy to load music on ear buds. Easy to use with a little experimenting. Quality of sound is excellent. Only complaint - Ambient sound function seems non-existent. No difference between on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great- until they weren't
customer_reviews.text: These were great- until they weren't. The sound quality and functions available were all great. But then the sound became inaudible in one of the buds rendering them useless. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle H

customer_reviews.title: Best allround wireless earbuds for Android
customer_reviews.text: The product is comfortable for earbuds. Theyre good quality and have great battery life. But i do have the issue where the right bud will act like its been taken out and pause my media if i turn my head to the right. Its very annoying and the left bud doesnt do this, but over all they are great earbuds and it may come down to me just having the wrong wingtip on
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, lots of features
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my girlfriend, who also bought me a pair. I love them, she loves them. Fit in my ear great, good battery life, great phone call clarity
customer_reviews.author: Kevan Howard

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work well for very long
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. Bought these with the intent to replace the Beats by Dre I had for 4 years after they finally gave way. These worked great for about six weeks until the sound in the right bud faded. Stuck with them for a little while longer thinking they would balance out again. Eventually the left bud would intermittently go silent while the right stayed quiet. Only saving grace is the warranty. Samsung is replacing this pair, but it’s hard to be optimistic that they will be any better. Hope others have had better luck with these than I have.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Clegg

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: I had these but had to return them they are very hard to answer calls they slip out all the time that causes them to disconnect from your device did not like them at all
customer_reviews.author: Martha80

customer_reviews.title: Good sound rest no so good
customer_reviews.text: Too hard to use touch controls...volume says slide but slide acts as tap
customer_reviews.author: Waynesworld

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES his Samsung Gear earphones
customer_reviews.text: He shoes them off to everyone, especially how he can set it so that he can hear someone talking to him beside him as he talks on the phone. He doesn’t miss a beat!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Pyburn

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but the volume is a problem
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes its connection is not stable when i put my phone on my pocket. The biggest problem is that after six months of use the left earpiece appeared to have much smaller volume than the right one. I tried cleaning the earpiece and it got better, but still, it is pretty obvious the volume is different.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Yeah they work, but just for the first couple of months.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these back in October and for the first 2 months they worked fine. Then I noticed the sound was low. The right earbud is barely louder than the left. I used to be able to drown out other noises but now it's not loud enough. I've seen other reviews and they've all said the same thing. Volume goes down especially the left one. I'd suggest looking at other earbuds until samsung fixes this.
customer_reviews.author: cristian

customer_reviews.title: The left ear bud just craps out after like 3 days
customer_reviews.text: The left ear bud just craps out after like 3 days. It's like muffed and there no way to boost it to match the right earbud. Googled it and apparently everyone having similar issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvements
customer_reviews.text: The Gear Iconx were good at first but, the left ear bud was faulty I sent them back almost a month ago and have not received the replacement ear buds. I am willing to give a better score as soon as I recieve my replacement ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Racso Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great Ebayer and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: She loves them and I'm happy! Works just as described. The only minor issue is the add shows the color white but is actually light grey. Great Ebayer and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Zachten

customer_reviews.title: I use these all thetime
customer_reviews.text: I love that they can store music internally. Great for running without bringing my phone. The workout app also works without being connected to your phone. I constantly recommend these to all my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Jake J.

customer_reviews.title: Pros Nice design. Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Pros Nice design. Good Quality. Long batery life. Good for many purpose like work out, running, working, etc... Easy to clean. Charge fast Have many earpiece size. Cons Connection Problem (music cut out sometimes, the earbuds remote control sometimes doesn't register when you try to use it. Usually plays a sound of connection when you already connected when you wear it.)
customer_reviews.author: Nam Ha

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I am a Samsung fan and decided to try out the IconX even though it was quite expensive. When I first got them they worked well, but after a couple weeks the left earbud started playing very softly even when set at max volume. I followed all the advice on samsungs forums to fix this, but it did not work. I emailed Samsung about getting a new pair and they never responded. Very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.author: KG328

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this.Battery life is great and the ability to download music directly to the earbuds is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Left ear volume issues
customer_reviews.text: Sent the first one back because the left ear volume was way lower. Got the new ones and a month later, same thing. Disappointed in Samsung with this. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: NEEVZ

customer_reviews.title: THEY GOOD BUT NOT THAT GOOD...I WANT MY MONEY BACK
customer_reviews.text: I had this item for twenty days and all ready my right one is going bad the sound is going out ....I though I had a winner between all of the Competition out there or maybe I got ah bad batch or something.............I got my replacement pair about a week ago 1/14 or so and guess what the replacement pair are bad to so with that said I will be getting my money back P.S.A DO NOT BUY THIS JUNK.....
customer_reviews.author: Byron

customer_reviews.title: The sound is perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! After using the buds for a few hours, all I have to do is put them back in their case, and the case recharges them!
customer_reviews.author: G Slivensky

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound...Not A Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds had great sound and all around great quality, but I couldn't get them to fit properly despite me using every size combination. They had sort of touchy controls on the earbuds, but I'm sure that you will get used to them. Like I said, amazing sound and overall quality, but make sure that you have the right sized ear for this sort of product.
customer_reviews.author: Mason W.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: One ear worked right the left ear had low volume other than that they were great
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: It came with out a manual and even when I went on youtube for instructions there was no clear instructions on how to pair this horrible ear buds. I don't normally write reviews but thought I would save someone the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Pierrette Celestin

customer_reviews.title: too Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Buds came quickly and for the first few weeks they were awesome and I used them all the time however after about 3 weeks the buds became super quiet. I tried cleaning them and resetting them but it seems like nothing works. It's too bad because they have a good battery life and are a perfect fit for the gym. I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Sound level is low not as loud as a previous pair.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: ... bought for my grandson and he instantly fell in love with them and was amazed with all of the ...
customer_reviews.text: This I bought for my grandson and he instantly fell in love with them and was amazed with all of the features of the ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: 5 star quality
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed by the quality, the looks and the value. There is a clear difference with bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Hyon Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable once you find the right tip and fin
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable once you find the right tip and fin. Good Bluetooth connection. Have not tested battery life yet, but enjoy the charge case.
customer_reviews.author: t.barb

customer_reviews.title: I liked the look of them
customer_reviews.text: I'll start off with saying the Customer Service was 10/10, a full refund was given with no questions asked. As for the headphones themselves, they lasted one week (very light use) before the right earbud went out. I liked the look of them, but they left my ears sore after about an hour of use.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Shouse

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Cool Idea. Not worth $200. Sound isn't loud at all.
customer_reviews.author: Coty Hall

customer_reviews.title: Use them for every run
customer_reviews.text: Connects with my watch and phone without issue. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Charles Grau

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't seem to balance volume level between left and right. Tried resetting, but it slowly loses its place.
customer_reviews.author: Kiyoshi Matsutsuyu

customer_reviews.title: Cannot rate
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift so I am unable to rate
customer_reviews.author: Janice Kimmel

customer_reviews.title: Loves these!!
customer_reviews.text: I use them everytime I exercise and they work great!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have them all over 200 and these are not best but do have small storage built in
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: For the cost, low sound quality. Keep getting gummed up( causes sound loose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Left ear bud louder than the right one
customer_reviews.text: This is a very poor product, I would not recommend it. There is a huge bug which Samsung apparently is not able to fix: after using the ear buds a couple of times, the right earbud is a lot louder than the left one. Just google this: it his a problem that seems to appear very frequently all over the world. For a product that comes at this price this is just very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy fix, (take out black film
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, left headphone volume decreased to ~20% of the right. Easy fix, (take out black film, remove with tweezers, and replace white adhesive (assuming waterproof?) layer), but I wouldn't go swimming with them now, and I'm not sure if the sound is entirely the same on both sides now. Not sure if I want to send back or not. If the Bose don't break, I might go with those.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound. However
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound. However, the colors used look fake. And by that I mean the pics used in advertising are grosly misguide. I bought a pair that were grey and when o got them...They for very grey. Lame, cheap plastic looking grey. Not shiney at all like in the pic.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: I've had plenty on wireless Buds these are excellent. Great connection
customer_reviews.text: I've had plenty on wireless Buds these are excellent. Great connection, both work simultaneously (I've had pairs that don't play nice together) battery is really good.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Starts off good but slowly goes bad
customer_reviews.text: I had these for about 2 months before I noticed my right earbud started to have volume issues. Another month past and connectivity issues went from good to awful and I can't put my phone in my pocket without issues of connection. It was overall a purchase I regret and might recommend getting something more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones, and the ability to store music on ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones, and the ability to store music on them and use them independent of a phone or MP3 player makes them much more versatile. The only drawback is the lack of noise cancelling features. Use as a headset for calls seems good, although they tend to take control of the phone and everything goes through them unless you kill Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice and load and solid
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best Bluetooth completely wireless ears buds I’ve ever had. The volume is nice and load and stay in my ears nice and tight even when sweating at the gym. Also blocks outside noise quite nice. Haven’t tried them yet as just a regular Bluetooth for phone but will soon. So far worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Stoneking

customer_reviews.title: These were good.
customer_reviews.text: The right eardbud is all of a sudden having volume issues. These were good.
customer_reviews.author: Andrae Moore

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is bad
customer_reviews.text: This earphones doesn't fit well on my ears. It keeps falling off. Sound quality is baad. You can do better than this Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Jez

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great fit, versatile true wireless!
customer_reviews.text: They work perfectly. I love the features like ambient noise. They work great one at a time even. The onboard storage is great when you want to run withoit your phone.The charging case is very fast as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle K

customer_reviews.title: Having some sound balance issues under conditions of moisture. ...
customer_reviews.text: Having some sound balance issues under conditions of moisture. If they get exposed to moisture from your sweat or other souces of moisture, one's volume of the earbuds becomes noticably quiet. This is my 3rd day with this product and I am having such problems.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pair. Always connects to phone when you insert. Sounds is great is phones settings correct.

customer_reviews.title: Brief Connection Issues

product_meta.title: Samsung Gear IconX (2018 Edition) Bluetooth Cord-free Fitness Earbuds, w/ On-board 4Gb MP3 Player (US Version with Warranty) - Gray - SM-R140NZAAXAR
product_meta.description: Color:GrayWherever you’re going, take your favorite songs along with Samsung Gear iconx fitness earbuds. With the freedom of a completely wireless design and long-lasting battery power, you can move to the music at every workout while keeping track of how far you go.
feature_bullets: 5 hours of Bluetooth streaming, 7 hours of MP3 listening, 4 hours talk time*
Speak commands via Bixby or Google Voice and control your music with just a tap or swipe
Meet your fitness goals with speed, distance, calorie tracking and real-time voice guidance. Audio Playing Format : MP3,M4A,AAC,WAV,WMA (WMA v9). Battery Capacity (Case) : 340 mAh
Find the perfect fit with multiple sizes of ear-tips and wing-tips right in the box
iOS/Mac users: Samsung Gear IconX can be used to stream music or take calls from your iOS handset or tablet. Fitness Functions that require the use of Samsung S-Health app are not available for iOS

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars382 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
